Setup¶

Summary¶

Setup the project. This is mostly a reminder to myself, if you are following along you can skip this page. Just make sure python 3 is installed.

Update and upgrade¶

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get upgrade

Set timezone¶

sudo dpkg-reconfigure tzdata

Install¶

sudo apt-get install python3

Folder¶

# repos/
mkdir GardenMonitor
cd GardenMonitor

Git¶

# repos/GardenMonitor
git init

# setup github repo, then...
git remote add origin https://github.com/rayblick/GardenMonitor.git
